mapper.select: SELECT qacode, userid, qatitle, qacontent, qafileurl, to_char(qawirtedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS qawritedate, answer FROM qatbl WHERE userid = #{userid} ORDER BY qawirtedate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qatbl (qacode, userid, qatitle, qacontent, qafileurl, qawirtedate, answer) VALUES ('Q' || qacode_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{qatitle}, #{qacontent}, #{qafileurl}, SYSDATE, '0')
